channel.title: Rosehill's Podcast
channel.description: A Weekly Podcast from Rosehill's Mitch McBain and Blake Myers recorded in Cypress, TX just outside Houston. The Texas Music Duo shares their thoughts about life, love, rock n' roll, the ever-changing music business, and life on the road as musicians. Topics include favorite music venues, favorite movies, food on the road, fun stories from the road, family traditions, fun promotions, and even the guy's rules to great weddings! It's a weekly dose of fun and laid back, Texas-style conversation. Join the Mitch and Blake each week by subscribing to Ridin' with Rosehill. If you have topics you want to hear Mitch and Blake cover, let them know!www.facebook.com/rosehilllive and www.rosehill-live.com

item.title: March Newscast
item.description: Here we go again. Your monthly Rosehill Newscast is back in action. We cover everything from the disaster in Japan to the NFL lockout. Take a listen! Ridin' with Rosehill is a weekly Podcast from Rosehill's Mitch McBain and Blake Myers recorded in Cypress, TX just outside Houston. The Texas Music Duo shares their thoughts about life, love, rock n' roll, the ever-changing music business, and life on the road as musicians. Topics include favorite music venues, Texas history, favorite movies, food on the road, fun stories from the road, family traditions, our take on current events, fun promotions, and even the guy's rules to great weddings! It's a weekly dose of fun and laid back, Texas-style conversation.

item.title: Texas History
item.description: Hello again friends! Did you know this week marked the 175th anniversary of Texas Independence? Hell yeah! This weeks podcast is all things Texas. We’ll have fun facts about this great state and a trivia challenge pitting Mitch against Rosehill’s own Cory Pendleton. Take a listen and God bless Texas! Ridin' with Rosehill is a weekly Podcast from Rosehill's Mitch McBain and Blake Myers recorded in Cypress, TX just outside Houston. The Texas Music Duo shares their thoughts about life, love, rock n' roll, the ever-changing music business, and life on the road as musicians. Topics include favorite music venues, favorite movies, food on the road, fun stories from the road, family traditions, fun promotions, and even the guy's rules to great weddings! It's a weekly dose of fun and laid back, Texas-style conversation.

item.title: Rodeo Houston
item.description: "It’s Rodeo Time, Houston! Since this weekend marks the start of Rodeo Houston, we'll talk about our personal experiences with the event. We will also hit on this year’s entertainment line-up. So dust off the old cowboy hat and shine up those boots! Ridin' with Rosehill is a weekly Podcast from Rosehill's Mitch McBain and Blake Myers recorded in Cypress, TX just outside Houston. The Texas Music Duo shares their thoughts about life, love, rock n' roll, the ever-changing music business, and life on the road as musicians. Topics include favorite music venues, favorite movies, food on the road, fun stories from the road, family traditions, fun promotions, and even the guy's rules to great weddings! It's a weekly dose of fun and laid back, Texas-style conversation."

item.title: February Newscast
item.description: Its that time again. It’s the news according to…well, us. This week’s Podcast is the February addition o the Rosehill Newscast. We’ll hit on topics such as the revolution in Egypt to the GRAMMY’s/ Take a listen and let us know what you think! item.title: Superbowl Sunday
item.description: It's Super Week down here in Texas. Everything football has descended upon a frozen north Texas for the big game. On this Ridin with Rosehill podcast, we will discuss growing up in Texas, where football is a religion, and our experience with being apart of this grand Texas tradition! SECOND PARAGRAPH.....Ridin' with Rosehill is a weekly Podcast from Rosehill's Mitch McBain and Blake Myers recorded in Cypress, TX just outside Houston. The Texas Music Duo shares their thoughts about life, love, rock n' roll, the ever-changing music business, and life on the road as musicians. Topics include favorite music venues, favorite movies, food on the road, fun stories from the road, family traditions, fun promotions, and even the guy's rules to great weddings! It's a weekly dose of fun and laid back, Texas-style conversation.

item.title: Rosehill's Wishlist
item.description: Is there an artist out there that you wish you could have seen live? Someone who is either no longer with us, or just retired? Well, for us, there’s a bunch! This week’s podcast, we discuss all the artist we wish we could have seen live. From Johnny Cash to Led Zeppelin and everywhere in between. Take a listen and let us know who you wish you could have seen. Ridin' with Rosehill is a weekly Podcast from Rosehill's Mitch McBain and Blake Myers recorded in Cypress, TX just outside Houston. The Texas Music Duo shares their thoughts about life, love, rock n' roll, the ever-changing music business, and life on the road as musicians. Topics include favorite music venues, favorite movies, food on the road, fun stories from the road, family traditions, fun promotions, and even the guy's rules to great weddings! It's a weekly dose of fun and laid back, Texas-style conversation.

item.title: Midnight America
item.description: We're talking about our new video for "Midnight America!" currently on rotation in CMT Pure! In this Ridin' with Rosehill episode, we talk about how the "Midnight America" video came about, the "making of" the video, and other news about where it may show up next! We are very excited about the video and we so hope you check it out at CMT.com! Ridin' with Rosehill is a weekly Podcast from Rosehill's Mitch McBain and Blake Myers recorded in Cypress, TX just outside Houston. The Texas Music Duo shares their thoughts about life, love, rock n' roll, the ever-changing music business, and life on the road as musicians. Topics include favorite music venues, favorite movies, food on the road, fun stories from the road, family traditions, fun promotions, and even the guy's rules to great weddings! It's a weekly dose of fun and laid back, Texas-style conversation.

item.title: January Newscast
item.description: Ridin' with Rosehill - Happy New Year everybody! The Ridin’ with Rosehill Podcast is back and better than ever! One of the new segments we will be doing every month is the Rosehill Newscast. It is a collection of random, current news stories that we will hit on. This segment ranges from the birds dropping from the sky in Arkansas and Louisiana to Ron Franklin getting fired from ESPN for sexist comments to a female sideline reporter. So check it out and see what we think about what’s going on in the world. (new paragraph) Ridin' with Rosehill is a weekly podcast from Mitch McBain and Blake Myers - the duo that makes up Rosehill. Rosehill is a phenomenon of the best Country Rock Music talent, determination and solidplatinum- to-come. With artist and producer, Radney Foster selecting them as his protégés and producing their album "White Lines and Stars," you know these guys are the real deal! Subscribe to get updates each week and follow the guys on Facebook too: www.facebook.com/rosehilllive

item.title: Holiday Festivities
item.description: Ridin' with Rosehill - Rosehill is giving their fans a special holiday gift. Visit www.facebook.com/rosehilllive to get in on the action! This week's podcast includes how to get this great gift and fun holiday memories from Mitch McBain and Blake Myers of Rosehill.
